properties.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 12 at 6:08AM CST until February 12 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Grand Forks ND
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, little additional snow.
Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, causing blowing snow and
visibilities less than half a mile. For the Wind Chill Warning,
dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50
below zero.

* WHERE...Benson and Eddy Counties.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 9 AM this morning to 3 PM
CST this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM
CST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce the
visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning
commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
